column4: A little problem people, i was going to compile Fluxbox but when running configure i got this error : configure: error: Your libstdc++ doesn't have the sstream or strstream classes ,, how do i fix it ?

A little problem people, i was going to compile Fluxbox but when running configure i got this error : configure: error: Your libstdc++ doesn't have the sstream or strstream classes ,, how do i fix it ?
